Yerwa Kanuri: Badiram kəriwudəben nguwuso kəla njiben balarozayin, daji allan awodo cintən awolaa asutəbe cado kuru isə nguwugano, Submarine sodən sədiya njiben cidatə mbujaga, sawu wande cintən shiga turənyiro. English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. Yerwa Kanuri: Kәla kauwa yala Meccaben, kaudә cotro dunyaadәma firtana. English: The first time I went to Mecca was in the summer of 1969, I was a student at the University of California, Berkeley.
